channel.title: Kernel on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on Dash

item.title: Customize SurfacePro Kernel
item.description: Preparation Get the kernel and patch file: To be Written Build Prepare for compiliation: $ make mrproper Get the current running configuration: $ zcat /proc/config.gz > .config $ make menuconfig $ make -j3 $ make modules_install Install Kernel, you newly generated kernel will be named as vmlinuz-4.1.13-surfacepro3(Though surfacepro, surfacepro3 will remains its name) : $ sudo cp -v arch/x86/boot/bzImage /boot/vmlinuz-4.1.13-surfacepro3 Generate the initial RAM disk:
